StarFlier::

She looked at Hope and Perceptor. "Uh, I was trying to talk to the 
new bot. I was thinking we could all be friends and fight this bad 
bot all together. You know, like a real army. That would be fun." she 
said with a real gleem in her eyes. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Perceptor:
> 
> Perceptor looked to New Hope and said "Who're you and what're you 
> doign in this base?????"
